page.title: 04Farming around Belper(2)
page.content: {Milnhay Farm}was once a barn and there is about 70acres of land.They have two horses,a big one called Winston and one called Sovereign. The family have lived there for about a 100 years. {Whitewells Farm}has 90 cows on 140 acres. The land is medium,very stoney with good drainage and they grow wheat,barley and oats. They have two workers. At{Dairywood Farm}117 acres are rented out for cattle and there are 8 acres of woodland. The farm is dated 1698 and belonged to the Hurt Estate. They have Motor Cross Racing where they ride motor bikes over rough ground and through ditches and woods. {Broadholme Farm}on Matlock Rd. was built in the 1860's.It has cows, chickens,peacocks,cats and geese. They sell rabbits at Â£1 each. In the yard there is a kennel with a King Charles Spaniel.
